author: Natasha Roy
title: NY AG opens hotline for Asian Americans to report harassment
description: As hate against Asians rises with the spread of the coronavirus, New York Attorney General Letitia James encouraged people to disclose their experiences.
content:
New York State Attorney General Letitia James has launched a hotline for New Yorkers to report hate crimes and discrimination amid rising reports of anti-Asian harassment amid the coronavirus outbreak.
James' office said in a statement that the hotline, whic… [+2032 chars]
